programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Caught on Tape / A Son Remembers (#102)
programme.desc: A video tape made at an ATM machine helps police in Louisville, KY, to nab a man suspected of raping 13 women.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: NCIS / Exhuming the Truth (#118)
programme.desc: After U.S. Navy sailor Andrew Muns disappears in 1968, the Navy claims that Muns went AWOL from his ship.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.sub-title: Devil In Disguise
programme.desc: A 23-year-old teacher vanished the evening before Easter after giving confession.

programme.title: Cold Case Files
programme.sub-title: Dark Angel
programme.desc: 13 days after Pam Pitts disappears in 1988 her body is found in the desert.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Reconstructing Murder/Fire Flicks
programme.desc: In Wisconsin, advances in forensic clay modeling help investigators identify a murder victim whose skin was stripped from her head, neck, and legs.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: The Well / The Deadly Ex (#89)
programme.desc: A pawned gun and a stolen pick-up truck are the clues that investigators need to solve an elderly man's murder.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: A Sister Lost / Rumors of Murder
programme.desc: A high school janitor is suspected in the murder of a young girl.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Murder Checks In/Killer In The City (#71)
programme.desc: Police hunt for a man who killed three women in three different hotels, not far from one another in Des Moines, Iowa, over a 5-year period; and police get a killer to confess.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Man in the Shadows / The Hitchhiker (#94)
programme.desc: After running DNA tests on more than 50 suspects, Ohio police finally get a good a lead on a serial rapist suspected of attacking at least 14 women.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: A Confession for Carmen / The Girls (#95)
programme.desc: A forensic scientist's painstaking examination of a rape kit helps solve the 15-year-old murder of a teenage girl.

programme.sub-title: Obsession: Dave Reichert and the Green River Killer
programme.desc: 100th Cold Case Files: Green River Killer 20-Year Hunt with Det. Reichert.

programme.sub-title: Snatched / A Detective's Promise
programme.desc: The dogged work of an Alberta, Canada, detective finally pays off.

programme.title: Cold Case Files Classic
programme.sub-title: Killer on Campus / The Bow Hunter
programme.desc: Police use DNA found on pantyhose to finally track down the killer.
